step.context: \textbf{Check Point }\# 1:\\ \text{Can this definite integral be evaluated ?} \\
step.reason: \text{It is true that } \dfrac{1}{\sqrt{1- x^2}} \text{ is discontinuous at } x=1 \\ \text{But we are calculating the area over } [0,1] \\ \text{where } \dfrac{1}{\sqrt{1- x^2}} \text{ is defined and is continuous.}\\ \text{So, the definite integral can be evaluated.}
